FuncDef: This command controls the action performed upon the extracted control packets when the configured policer rates are exceeded.
CLIs: exceed-action { discard [ hold-down <seconds> ] | low-priority [ hold-down <seconds> ] | none }

ParaDef.Info: Marks packets that are nonconforming as low-priority (for example, discard eligible or out-profile). If there is congestion in the control plane of the SR OS then unmarked (for example, green, hi-prio or in-profile) control packets are given preferential treatment.
When this optional parameter is specified, it causes the following "hold-down" behavior. Values-1 to 10080, indefinite, none.
